name: EIRA - SGA 2019 Mobile Entry
description:
Ever had a boring bus ride? Maybe you've just completed your favorite game or book. Or you just need a new game that you can become emerged in, we've got  exactly what you're looking for, a new way to experience puzzle solving.

But watch out, you might just miss that next bus stop! 

In this Viking themed adventure you'll be able to manage the main hero; Eira - the merciful, which also happens to be the hand of Odin! Prepare your cards and wit to manage your moves strategically in order to advance through new levels and campaigns.  The land might even hold hidden chests and unlockable cosmetics, only for the most adept of explorers to find and equip, best of luck!

(This version has the shop items unlocked and also levels unlocked for the Swedish Game Awards)
